channel.title: Unknown - 317 - Customs - Duel Arena - Beta Testers Needed
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/du5yazN.png[/img]
Features: - Yanille Home - Train All 21 Skills to level 120! - Duel Arena one that actually works, and will never be disabled. - 24/7 365 Up-Time - Extremely Stable holds over 1900 players! - Custom Whips (Lime, Lava, Dragon etc.) - New Updates all the time! - Brand new community, this give you the edge to join now and be set for later! - Full Screen Client Capability! - Amazing Switching perfect for Hybriding at PKing spots!
-Eco Resets WILL NEVER HAPPEN- Are you afraid the Economy will ever be reset? Hah! Don't ever worry about that we give you 100% Guarantee the items you earn are the items you keep!
|Photos| Custom Black Partyhat and Whips! [img]http://i.imgur.com/w9IZiNP.png[/img] Full-Screen Client! [img]http://i.imgur.com/06Ihle1.png[/img] Train every skill up to 120, and get a combat level of 153! [img]http://i.imgur.com/9lvVd5i.png[/img] Yanille Shops [img]http://i.imgur.com/CD0gLwy.png[/img] Home Area - Yanille Super Spacious! [img]http://i.imgur.com/aoTozZ5.png[/img] Thieving at Home! [img]http://i.imgur.com/mpLiQkS.png[/img] Many Pking Options [img]http://i.imgur.com/twvZj4w.png[/img]
Beta Testing Week!
To apply just say: Beta-Tester.
[/center]

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

updater:

Okay mate, I wonder why you are Ex-Staff, probably because of how hard you rage.

And yes Clawz, get in line brah.

item.source: Unknown - 317 - Customs - Duel Arena - Beta Testers Needed

item.title: Unknown - 317 - Customs - Duel Arena - Beta Testers Needed
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

updater:

Okay mate, I wonder why you are Ex-Staff, probably because of how hard you rage.

Can you repeat this in english? I don’t see your arguments. It’s like a one person fighting with twenty others. If that one guy has good fighting skills, then he might win. In this context, it’s programming skills. You simply can’t understand. Look I appreciate for your hard work that you MIGHT of put in your server. However you can’t claim the impossible. Let me brake this down for you. I’ll put it in three sections, Client, Server, Staff(you).

Server

  1. Are you sure that the server can hold 1900 players?! You understand that PIs can nearly support 200. Unless you get a super 32gb ram dedi for 500$ per month?

  2. 24/7 365 uptime? So this is a PROJECT with 24/7 365 uptime support. Can you elaborate on this subject.

  3. “Unique Yanille home!” “Spacious home area!” Are those even called ‘features’? I can’t believe this. You’re actually the first person to achieve such great useful feature! No, but seriously, you should have shame to post such stuff.

Client

  1. That’s not a ‘fullscreen client’. It’s a resize-able java application. First off, you did not made it. So you should of post credits to the person who have put the effort. However, it’s badly made. Only mine and few other respected client developers have a greatly-written fullscreen. But i must say, that even saw Galkon’s client and I got disappointed. Therefor, those features don’t attract much players anymore.

  2. That ‘fucked-up’ scene map should of been fixed. And I have to say that it’s an easy fix. However, I guess you’re busy writing skills that are already written in the tutorial section by you?

  3. Custom items? I have nothing to say on that disaster.

Staff

  1. Bad, inappropriate and offensive words are always welcome! It just gets your own reputation down. I don’t know if much is left as you just throw it away.

  2. You have to set goals. You project doesn’t include a intro, nor a development log. It’s just badly organized.

[hr]

This is nothing offensive. I swear that another offensive post will be reported. I am pretty sure you will go muted or even banned with such offensive posts.

HOWEVER, I do believe you can do better. I hope I am not wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Unknown - 317 - Customs - Duel Arena - Beta Testers Needed
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

updater:

If you think that is constructive then RUBY YOU ARE A MORON. Yeah I am using the [PI] base, but I am making it better then what it was, so if you think that is wrong, then you are hopeless and should just give up. At least I am trying to update the Project Insanity base rather then say it sucks and throwing it in the trash.

The fact that you said you’re making PI better than what it was and called me a moron in the same paragraph is enough in itself.

To improve PI you need to throw it in the trash, that’s where it belongs. If you can’t see that then believe me, you are the moron. This goes back to the whole “you cannot polish a turd” saying. Project insanity is a pile of shit, to improve it you need to rewrite the entire server. If you had any clue of what you were doing you’d go for a server more the likes of apollo and runesource, not PI.

Read full topic
item.source: Unknown - 317 - Customs - Duel Arena - Beta Testers Needed

item.title: Unknown - 317 - Customs - Duel Arena - Beta Testers Needed
item.dc:creator: @updater updater
item.description:
@updater wrote:

I chopped that bitch: BAM! LOLOL!
For the record I have been rewriting most of these skills, so that’s why they work. When I first got this source I couldn’t even light logs. The farming, didn’t work what-so-ever, the Fishing, wouldn’t fish it didn’t even give animations it just gave me Shrimp and did nothing. It is an insult that you would send me to that link. The Custom Whips even though they are only INT’s I added those, I followed no tutorials I re-wrote these skills myself. Don’t believe me, it’s okay. You have a nice project going stick with it, and I will stick with mine.


This is a project, not a release. Why judge me, and for the person that was ahead of you I don’t think this is constructive criticism:[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:538313”][quote author=updater link=topic=657137.msg4396302#msg4396302 date=1389225327]

  • Yanille Home
  • Train All 21 Skills to level 120!
  • Full Screen Client Capability!
  • Custom Whips (Lime, Lava, Dragon etc.)
  • Amazing Switching perfect for Hybriding at PKing spots!
  • Duel Arena one that actually works, and will never be disabled.
    [/quote]
    seen before and you probably used a tutorial
  • Extremely Stabile holds over 1900 players!

doubt it since this looks like a project insanity and you can’t even spell stable[/quote][quote=“artem543, post:5, topic:538313”]There isn’t anything nice to say. So I guess this thread will go down the list. But seriously, get some professionalism in here. Don’t be that small pi-tutorial-snippet-showw-off-faggot. Otherwise, good luck I guess. This is my last comment.[/quote]

If you think that is constructive then RUBY YOU ARE A MORON. Yeah I am using the [PI] base, but I am making it better then what it was, so if you think that is wrong, then you are hopeless and should just give up. At least I am trying to update the Project Insanity base rather then say it sucks and throwing it in the trash.

Read full topic

item.title: Unknown - 317 - Customs - Duel Arena - Beta Testers Needed
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:16, topic:538313”][quote author=updater link=topic=657137.msg4396624#msg4396624 date=1389317334]

[quote author=artem543 link=topic=657137.msg4396384#msg4396384 date=1389238848]
There isn’t anything nice to say. So I guess this thread will go down the list. But seriously, get some professionalism in here. Don’t be that small pi-tutorial-snippet-showw-off-faggot. Otherwise, good luck I guess. This is my last comment.
[/quote] So much for this is my last comment LOL.
[/quote]I was trying to stay out of this since I don’t usually get into arguments around here any more, they’re just pointless, however you’re really grinding my gears. If I still had my moderator status you’d have been heavily, heavily infracted by now. You continually keep sparking an argument even when others have tried to stop it. You have literally the most basic knowledge of Java and you seem to continually pick fights with people who are decent enough programmers to hold their own on something like an RSPS. They are merely pointing out mistakes you’ve made, just because they don’t sugar coat it doesn’t mean they’re giving you “extreme criticism” or being trolls. If you actually understood criticism then you’d realise that it’s a good thing to a programmer and helps you improve your code massively. Get a grip.[/quote]
That’s kind.

You may also want to read this

Projects: This is not the place to post minor projects, such as, changing spawn locations, adding a few commands then saying you will release. We want something more major than that, seeing as all you do to change spawn locations is change a number and you're done. We don't want to see that you can change a number, we want to see that you can create something that will change the server in such a way that it'll make it funner and more enjoyable for the players, or that you can change the game code to make it more efficient at doing a certain task or to have more stability overall.

[hr]

You will earn my respect once you fix this:

Read full topic

item.title: Unknown - 317 - Customs - Duel Arena - Beta Testers Needed
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:8, topic:538313”][quote author=updater link=topic=657137.msg4396506#msg4396506 date=1389293727]
I don’t follow tutorials, I write tutorials, for people to use. I have been with the [PI] base for over 3 years. I think I know what I am talking about when it comes to Project Insanity.
[/quote]

Smart ass, may you show-off some snippets of codes that are written by you then?[/quote]

this is how to make yourself an admin 


1.open your server folder.
2.open the server folder inside it.
3.open the folder of the name of your server.
4.go to you characters folder.
5.click on the name of the person you wish to make mod/admin.(open with notepad)
6.locate where is says:
character-rights = 0
7.change the zero to one of the following:

1=moderator(silver crown)
2=server admin(gold crown)
3=server owner(gold crown)



8.when you are done, make sure to click the file tab at the top, and click save(make sure the player is not online, because it will not work.(tell them to log out before you click save.))

there you go... enjoy being a mod.

That’s coding right?

Read full topic
